column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Two foreign males were arrested by police for illegal overstaying on December 04
column6: Tomas Szsankara Esua was detained after he spent some time in Russian hospital. He admitted to police that he entered Cambodia on September 2014
column7: via Phnom Penh International Airport. His visa on  January 08
column10: said he arrived in Cambodia on November 18
column12: via Phnom Penh International Airport. He was living at a house in street 43
column14: but he has no job and it is suggested that he has mental health issues.------The suspects were both sent to the Immigration Department to follow the legal procedure.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/136829
